class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#684044">love </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa06e">thee, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#684044">year </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" class="text_word">less </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">appear </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#684044">sacrifice </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa06e">cease. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">However, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#90688c">Dear, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6c88ff">Forever </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">might </xhtml:span><xhtml:span
